subject: Lacrosse
Protective Clothing
Sports Injuries
Concussions
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: The Florida High School Athletic Association wanted players to wear protective headgear, but the decision left the sport’s national governing body, coaches and players fuming.
snippet: The Florida High School Athletic Association wanted players to wear protective headgear, but the decision left the sport’s national governing body, coaches and players fuming.
